alert.note: Alert for Appling; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 3:56PM EDT until May 03 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jeff Davis County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Appling County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst, Graham, Plant Hatch and Pine Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
